alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Lucie and southeastern Indian River Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vero Beach, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Pierce, Vero Beach, Indian River Shores, Vero Beach South and Gifford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie
